abilities.name: Ruthless Ingenuity
info: Basic Attacks inflict a -5% Dizzy Debuff to the target for 8 seconds. (Max Stacks: 4)
Heavy Attacks only hit one target and have a 25% chance per Dizzy Debuff to inflict Root for 6 seconds. (Max Stacks: 1)
This Root cannot be reapplied until it expires. When this Root expires it also removes all Dizzy Debuffs affecting the target.

abilities.name: Neural Supression Cannon
info: Enemies in a line are Rooted for 6 seconds, then are dealt 400% damage. (Max Stacks: 1)
Enemies that are already Rooted are instead Stunned for 6 seconds before damage is dealt. (Max Stacks: 1)

abilities.name: Seeing Spots
info: Cruella deals an additional 30% damage to Dizzy enemies.
Cruella deals an additional 60% damage to Rooted enemies.
Cruella deals an additional 90% damage to Stunned enemies.

talents.name: Cunning Mastermind
talents.info: Grants +20% Focus at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Incandescent Rage
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Get Them, You Louts!
talents.info: If Cruella hits a Rooted enemy with a Heavy Attack, that enemy gains Lure for 5 seconds and other allies gain a 20% Attack Buff for the same duration. Only one enemy can be Lured at a time. [Max Stacks: 1]

talents.name: Pit Maneuver
talents.info: When Cruella dashes through an enemy with 4 or more Dizzy Debuffs, she removes all Dizzy Debuffs from that target and Stuns them for 4 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1] This ability has an 8 second cooldown.

talents.name: Subsonic Lummox Flummoxer
talents.info: If an enemy is Rooted or Stunned by any of Cruella's abilities and has Armor remaining, they are inflicted with an instant 300% Shock.

talents.name: Auric Sonic Pistol
talents.info: While Cruella is in the encounter, her allies deal an additional 30% damage to Rooted enemies. When an enemy inflicted with a Dizzy Debuff misses, they receive a -5% Defense Debuff for 12 seconds. [Max Stacks: 5]
